description:
Souther`s forces abduct children and conscript them for the construction of his Holy Cross Mausoleum.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nanto Hakuroken Shuu! Omae wa Kono Seikimatsu ni Nani o Miru no ka!!
Shu of the South Star White Heron Fist! What Will You Witness in the End of the Century?!
南斗白鷺拳シュウ! お前は この世紀末に何を見るのか!!
